meanings.definition: The granting or regulation of licenses.
meanings.sent1: Obtaining licensure for driving is necessary to legally operate a vehicle.
meanings.sent2: She proudly displayed her licensure as a certified teacher.
meanings.sent3: The cat joked that it needed licensure to catch mice.
meanings.sent4: His licensure to practice law was his ticket to helping others in need.
meanings.sent5: The bright red licensure document stood out among the papers on his desk.

meanings.sent1: After years of hard work, she finally achieved licensure as a nurse.
meanings.sent2: His licensure as a pilot allowed him to fly planes all around the world.
meanings.sent3: The licensure of the dog to bark loudly was met with mixed reactions.
meanings.sent4: Her licensure in photography opened up a world of creative possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The licensure of the restaurant ensured high standards of food safety.
